cards.text: In the beginning there was darkness. Then something lit up and illuminated our world. A fire. Our shadows fell onto the walls of the cave we sat in and showed a wild dance.
Some of us tried to move to the dance, but doing so only intensified the movements of the shadows and it got harder and harder to mimic them.
Where the light hit the caves walls it edged cavities in the rock. We put our fingers in the cracks and pulled.
We digged and digged. Further up, leaving the cave behind, which slowly faded from memory, like a dream. Trying to reach the surface.
In the beginning there was the tunnel and I, Baraba, swore to protect it.
